TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit FontWeight extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

Docs.summary: Refers to the density of a typeface, in terms of the lightness or heaviness of the strokes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加權的差異是通常由提高的筆劃或區分所關聯之指定字元的字樣，相較於 「 正常 」 的字元從該相同的字體粗細。 **請注意**並非所有的權數可供所有的字樣。 無法使用字樣加權時，會傳回最接近的相符加權。 ## XAML Attribute Usage ```

public: static int Compare(System::Windows::FontWeight left, System::Windows::FontWeight right);
static member Compare : System.Windows.FontWeight * System.Windows.FontWeight -> int

Docs.returns: An value that indicates the relationship between the two instances of . When the return value is less than zero, is less than . When this value is zero, it indicates that both operands are equal. When the value is greater than zero, it indicates that is greater than .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 淺色字型加權會小於較重的字型粗細。 例如，"Light"或"Normal"字型粗細小於"UltraBold"字型粗細。
## Examples 在下列程式碼範例中，<xref:System.Windows.FontWeight.Compare%2A>方法用來評估兩個<xref:System.Windows.FontWeight>物件。
[!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontSnippet11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#fontsnippet11)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontSnippet11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#fontsnippet11)]
